hero.seekingDescription: As a Full-Stack Developer (JavaScript/TypeScript). Ready for new challenges!

about.p1: I'm a <bold>Full-Stack Developer</bold> with over <bold>two years</bold> of experience in web development. I focus on building <bold>clean</bold>, <bold>efficient</bold>, and <bold>responsive</bold> applications while constantly improving my skills through real-world projects. <italic>I enjoy working in a team</italic> and taking new challenges.
about.p2: My journey in development started in high school when I got into <bold>modding Minecraft</bold>, creating custom modifications and clients in <bold>Java</bold>. That early passion led me to software development, where I continue to explore and grow.

simpleff.title: SimpleFF
simpleff.description: A simple interface for FFmpeg built with Tauri/SvelteKit that allows users to select video files and reformat them with customizable codec options.

climate.title: Climate Visualization Platform
climate.description: A collaborative project with a team of 2, where we developed a website featuring a map displaying temperature readings from multiple measuring stations, isolines, and the temperature gradient.

foodly.title: Food Composition Recognition App
foodly.description: A mobile application for recognizing the composition of food (dishes) using image recognition technology.

licensePlate.title: Vehicle License Plate Recognition
licensePlate.description: A system for recognizing vehicle license plates for cars and other vehicles using computer vision techniques.

sveltekitAuth.title: SvelteKit Authentication Example
sveltekitAuth.description: Full-stack authentication implementation using SvelteKit and Lucia-auth. Features include email/password, GitHub & Google OAuth, avatar uploads, dark theme, session management (view/revoke), account linking, password reset, and profile updates. Uses Prisma ORM and Zod validation.

optifineSrc.title: Optifine Decompiled Source
optifineSrc.description: Decompiled source code for the Optifine mod using ParchmentMC/MCP-Reborn mappings. Includes manual fixes for runnability and covers newer Minecraft versions.
